actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to prohibit commercial air tour operations over national parks within the geographical area of the greater Yellowstone ecosystem.
short_title: Yellowstone and Teton Scenic Overflight Exclusion Act of 2000

summary.text: Yellowstone and Teton Scenic Overflight Exclusion Act of 2000 - Amends Federal transportation law to prohibit commercial air tour operation in the airspace over Yellowstone National Park, Grand Teton National Park, or the John D. Rockefeller Memorial Parkway.

titles.title: Yellowstone and Teton Scenic Overflight Exclusion Act of 2000
A bill to prohibit commercial air tour operations over national parks within the geographical area of the greater Yellowstone ecosystem.
